definitions.definition: To move or pass from one place, person or thing to another.
definitions.example: to transfer the laws of one country to another; to transfer suspicion

definitions.definition: To convey the impression of (something) from one surface to another.
definitions.example: to transfer drawings or engravings to a lithographic stone

definitions.definition: To arrange for something to belong to or be officially controlled by somebody else.
definitions.example: The title to land is transferred by deed.
